description: Not far from the Duomo, this historic restaurant takes its name from the mulberry tree (morer in local dialect) that once stood in front of the building. Elegant, simple decor in the dining room, which is adorned with a wooden - beamed ceiling. The menu features fish and seafood, including a good choice of raw dishes.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
